WorkItem.Description:
In my recent project using PHPWord library, I found it would be failed to insert an image with uppercase extension (e.g. JPG, JPEG). There is a simple workaround:

FILE: Section/Image.php      LINE: 76
FUNCTION: PHPWord_Section_Image::__construct()     LINE: 6

The source code determine image type in this way:
in_array($inf['extension'], $_supportedImageTypes)

At the line just above, there is an variable $ext defined but never used, which exactly fits this determination operation. So I changed the code to:
in_array($ext, $_supportedImageTypes)

Then it works fine.
WorkItem.Summary: Fail to insert an image with uppercase extension
